TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: I served all world wars (I,II, and III) and still remain to be in late teenage years by means of time travelling. That's why I'm a tech-savvy individual in the present day.

I have ancestor who fought in WWI and the other in WWII. Both are dead, but one of my grandma's has their war medals.

The house that my dad used to live in had a large Cabinet, with all the medals his side of my family received, from my great-great grandfather (And probably even earlier!) to himself.

That was cool.
Who started Chobit ranting about the military?

Who started Chobit ranting about the military?
Mercy talking about Nazi grenades.

Who started Chobit ranting about the military?

I wouldn't call it ranting, merely correcting me on my terminology.

Who started Chobit ranting about the military?

*slits Leons throat like a military...guy*

should've thought that out more...hmm.
Don't get Chobit talking about military things, please... You only see her here. I get it here and through Facebook.

I wouldn't call it ranting, merely correcting me on my terminology.

Just start to criticize either the Japan or Germany and you'll see what I mean.

Banana boats.

They came from Aslace France (formerly Germany).

The name was entered at Ellis Island as Muench.

And I'm sitting here, letting my blonde hair catch some sunshine as my blue eyes read this, thinking that in WWII they inadvertently scattered the genetics they sought to the winds by scaring away all the people that carried them.

Just start to criticize either the Japan or Germany and you'll see what I mean.
Criticizing Germany or Japan? Why would you do that

*beats Rage to death with her shovel*

My family has been in the military since before they even invented medals! >

[EDIT]: WHO'S TALKIN' SMACK BOUT MAH AXIS NATIONS???

Banana boats.

They came from Aslace France (formerly Germany).

The name was entered at Ellis Island as Muench.

And I'm sitting here, letting my blonde hair catch some sunshine as my blue eyes read this, thinking that in WWII they inadvertently scattered the genetics they sought to the winds by scaring away all the people that carried them.

Boats made out of ripe bananas? That would taste good...

*beats Rage to death with her shovel*

My family has been in the military since before they even invented medals! >

So they were the first people to invent the military?

And theirs no needed for killing Rage.

Just start to criticize either the Japan or Germany and you'll see what I mean.

Why would I do that? Japan and Germany are fine countries.

The parties ruling them during the second war? Not so fine. In fact so unfine I'd go as far as saying that the atrocities they ordered were among some of the worst in history.

However the countries themselves? Very nice places.

Ow.

I think we have an entry for: "How to troll Chobit 101"

step one: Be uninformed about military things.

@Mercy: you're doomed.
German Engineering remains extremely talented to this day, despite having been abused so badly during wartime.

[EDIT]: WHO'S TALKIN' SMACK BOUT MAH AXIS NATIONS???

NO,No,no,noooooooo. They are fine, just ruled at the time by bad people.

Oh and anyone interested in rock music should check these guys out.

They're really good, and about to release a new album!

Guys! I have just recently ascended to a higher level of existence, after training hard for it.

What should I do next?

Ow.

I think we have an entry for: "How to troll Chobit 101"

step one: Be uninformed about military things.

@Mercy: you're doomed.

Not necessarily... Militarily speaking, I'm dumb as a post. And somehow, Chobit still speaks to me...

German Engineering remains extremely talented to this day, despite having been abused so badly during wartime.

Hell, even their engineering during the war was brilliant. Simply put to the wrong use.

German Engineering remains extremely talented to this day, despite having been abused so badly during wartime.

They recovered massively from WW2. That's very impressive after the damage they suffered.

NO,No,no,noooooooo. They are fine, just ruled at the time by bad people.

Oh, hell! LEON WE NEED TO GTFO RIGHT NOW! *alarms blare*
Worst in history? I'm sorry, I can't hear you over the sound of the British Empire. Or the Holodomor. Or the Roman Empire.

Guys! I have just recently ascended to a higher level of existence, after training hard for it.

What should I do next?

Go for coffee!
